forecast.day_comments: Isolated snow showers.  Mostly sunny, with a steady temperature around 16. Northwest wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 34 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 20%.
forecast.night_comments: Mostly clear, with a low around -7. Wind chill values as low as -17. Northwest wind 5 to 8 mph becoming calm  after midnight.
